headline: We are hiring! | Co founder StraitsX (Fazz Financial Group) | YCombinator S15 | Forbes 30 Under 30
summary:
●Extremely honored to be in Forbes Magazine's 30 under 30 Asia 2017 list, which annually selects 30 of the top entrepreneurs, innovators and game changers under the age of 30.    #ForbesU30Asia 

● eFounder fellow at Alibaba Group

● My reflections on software development: http://victorliew.quora.com/

● https://www.xfers.com/sg-blog/xfers-raises-usd-30m-from-payfazz-and-jointly-forms-fazz-financial-group 

● (We’re hiring!)  https://jobs.lever.co/xfers,

experiences.title: eFounder Fellow
experiences.description:
eFounders Fellowship Course is a highly-selective program where participants are handpicked by Alibaba Business School and the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development. 

eFounders fellow gets to learn directly from Jack, his co-founders and senior management team on entrepreneurship, leadership and management from an Eastern perspective.

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.description:
Engineering management > 250 engineers, Security, and Infrastructure.

Engineering process, Engineering maturity model, Infra architecture 

Building Stablecoin infrastructure, stable coin use case, Defi liquidity, Crypto treasury, structured products, and distribution. 

Engineering recruitment and hiring

experiences.title: Co-Founder / Solidity Engineer
experiences.description:
Co-authored https://www.mas.gov.sg/news/media-releases/2023/mas-proposes-standards-for-digital-money 

Co-Authored https://www.mas.gov.sg/schemes-and-initiatives/project-orchid 

Wrote the specification https://github.com/PurposeBoundMoney/PBM as the base foundation for an EIP proposal

Pilot the use of PBM with Grab, Amazon, F1 Singapore, and Docomo.

experiences.title: Co-Founder / CTO
experiences.description: Engineering projects that we are working on include AML, transaction monitoring, compliance and regulatory technology, ledger systems, credit card BIN code issuance, open banking architecture, legacy banking infrastructure connectivity, automated accounting and auditing, stablecoins, blockchain and cryptocurrency,

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.description:
Xfers (YCombinator S15) is the best way to collect and make payments programmatically in Asia. 

We provide payments license expertise, kyc, compliance, aml, and wallet technology for fintechs in South East Asia. 

We are the only private company alongside 4 other state own entities to be granted a WASVF (e-money) license in Singapore: http://www.mas.gov.sg/Singapore-Financial-Centre/Payment-and-Settlement-Systems/Payment-Media/Stored-Value-Facilities.aspx 


We are hiring! https://jobs.lever.co/xfers

experiences.title: Technical Analyst
experiences.description:
Technology Infrastructure Services team 

Data warehouse engineering / DevOps

● Strategic reporting interfaces that are used by management for monitoring purposes.

● Built an in-house data collection engine with real-time pipelining capabilities. Unified and normalized various data sources within APAC infrastructures and establishing a unified data warehouse as part of a Green Belt Project.

● Maintained a data warehouse that allows for various reporting and querying to be done by various infrastructure platform teams.

● Developed migration and connectivity tools in the migration from legacy ITSM to ServiceNow ITIL change management system.

accomplishment_projects.title: A-Star learner
accomplishment_projects.description: An interactive Microsoft Kinect educational software for autistic children. We aim to help children with autistic spectrum disorder to learn and develop various social and functional motor skills. Click on the above link to learn more about the project
